Text: This file is missing the last 10 mins- the 2nd 10 mins being repeated.

It's actually the 4 minutes that gets repeated.  20:00 to 24:00 repeats again, at 24:00-28:00.  Whatever happens after 24:00 is missing.

Also, it is missing probably 4 minutes from the beginning.

But this is the same across all torrent sites, this is how it was released by the scene.  Hopefully there'll be a REPACK or FIXED release soon.

Viewers in UK can watch it on BBC iplayer until the proper (hopefully) comes out. Its only a short bit from the beginning and short bit from the end missing here. 

Cheers TvTeam for this and in advance if yous are indeed releasing a fixed one.

Fitting the scenes repeating glitch occurs shortly after Cartoon Head and Jess experiment with some ketamine :)

episode runs for 14:25 then reverts back to 19 mins -so its morelike 2 or 3 mins lost not 10 as stated in post 1 .its like it was made in windows movie maker or somethin -dont recall bbc doin that -seems like a clip got pushed in,like in wmm .not the end of the world
Like others have said, this file is faulty, with a few minutes missing from the end. I dunno if 4 minutes are missing from the beginning ... more like 4 seconds. The rest still plays well: V8 A9.
